survey_response.review_text: I'm suffering from bleeding p/v with severe pain abdomen due to Adhenomyosis first I took medical treatment then diagnostic hysteroscopy with D&C done. But no Relief then I went to Dr. Poonam Khera she Robotic surgery for uterus removal (Robotic Hysterectomy). My stay in hospital is 48hrs. Now I was perfectly fine. Thanks to Dr. Poonam Khera

I  highly recommend DR. Poonam Khera. I was suffering from Heavy menstrual flow since 6 months. Dr. Poonam diagnosed me with Abnormal Uterine Bleeding. She suggested Hysterectomy as my uterus was bulky with multiple Fibroids. She did Total Laparoscopic hysterectomy with bilateral salpingectomy with vault suspension. I was discharged after 48 hours. It’s been 6 weeks since the surgery was done. I am absolutely fine. Dr. Poonam is not only an excellent Doctor, she is a very warm human being. She has a friendly approach towards her patients, is very approachable and always has a smile on her face. She made me very comfortable during the entire process. I highly recommend her.

we are soo happy with Dr poonam khera treatment we are facing with pain and feeling of heavinesson leftside of abdomen with urinary complaint Dr diagnose with large fabroid uterus with bartholin cyst with cystoceleoperated with total laparoscopy hysterectomy with BSO with adhesiolysis with vault suspension with excision of batholin cyst with repair of cystocoele by doctor Poonam khera on 18 th May 2024operation done with very professional way we are so satisfied and speedy recovery.

My mother suffered from pain abdominal heaviness in lower abdomen since 2 months on and off. Retention of urine from last 1 month. 

Diagnosis: Post menopausal bleeding 

Treatment: total laparoscopic hysterectomy with salpingoopheretomy with right ovarian cystectomybwith adhesiolysis with vault suspension.

I visited BlK Max Super specility Gynae hosted by Dr Poonam Khera.
The reception was exciting of her welcoming face and caring of patient.
I had to do sceeening as usually for a woman above 50yrs and she advice the same .U underwent creeninh and i realised i had problem with cervix.
Upon the process i find the  problem was big which will need surgery.
She agreed to sit and discuss the way forward and comeout with the suggestion of different modalities of taking care of the problem
At last after all the screening i choose the Robotic hysterectomy which is latest technology  of which she told me patient heals fast,no bleeding and fast recovery surgery.

** ***** ** *** ** *** **** ******* ** *** **** ** ****** She advised me throughout my pregnancy. She has a very kind demeanor and is committed to her patients wellbeing completely. 

She has a dedicated and an extremely competent team of doctors. The entire team which was assigned to my delivery was very helpful, forthcoming with information. Under the guidance of Dr Khera they made the entire delivery experience extremely smooth. We are very grateful to have been in Dr Khera's able hands for our baby's arrival.

I guess doctor should get patients as per the schedule and should not have to be hasty or overworked or multi tasking with phone calls from other patients.

I got 5 minutes for her for my first visit and 4 minutes for my first follow up and 2 minutes for my last follow up.

When the problem reoccurred after 2 months, I got 2 minutes for my first consultation with her. And there was one more medical person to assist her who was equally hasty. ** *** **** **** ********* *** ***** ** ********* ***** ***** *** ******* yet paying 1000 or 750 rupees after discount for every visit so far felt unfair.

If the consultation fee is universal so should be the consultation time. And one patient at a time is a better deal.

My next visit will be on 29 July or around that time.

I was suffering from bleeding problem & pain abdomen, but no relief with medicine. So, I consulted Dr. POONAM KHERA she did my Total Laparoscopic Hysterectomy in BLK-MAX I didn’t face any problem under her. I was discharged after 36-48 hours.
My experience with Dr. POONAM KHERA was amazing, she was extremely friendly and understanding.

My wife was suffering from bleeding problem & pain abdomen, but no relief with medicine. So, I consulted Dr. POONAM KHERA she did my Total Laparoscopic Hysterectomy in BLK-MAX I didn’t face any problem under her. I was discharged after 36-48 hours.
My experience with Dr. POONAM KHERA was excellent and surgery was done without any issue.

Hello  Viewers, 
It was very critical and bad situation  for my mother (Age - 52 years) when she was facing :
1- Heavy bleeding during menses since 4-5 months.
2- Heavy pain on lower stomach i.e. Dysmenorrhea.
3- Abnormal uterine bleeding with uterine didelphys with thickened ET with left ovarian cyst.
by keeping her condition in mind, I did consult Dr. Poonam khera (Associate Director Genecology & Obstetrics, BLK Hospital New Delhi). First She examined my mother professionally. and thereafter perform procedure very well i.e. Total laparoscopic hysterectomy with bilateral salpingo - opherectomy with bladder repair was done positively.
Along with I would also share an incident - When my mom was admit during treatment and she need Dr. Khera's help in mid night, due to some medical urgency  that time too, Dr. khera personally handle that situation.
Now, after 10 month of operation my mother is totally fit and fine and working as a normal house wife. 
From our sides, we gives :
1- Professionalism : 5/5 Star
2- Knowledge : 5/5 star
3- Humility : 5/5 star

Thanks again Dr. Khera, I pray to god that you achieve next to you want. 
Thanks BLK Hospital team.

Regards,
Suraj Kumar 
***** ** * *************

I was diagnosed with abnormal uterine bleeding and the procedure of diagnostic hysterodcopy and D&C was performed on 26th Feb-24. It was all very smooth and comfortable, and I was discharged within 24 hrs. 
I could see that my problem started improving from the very next day and it was fully normal in 3-4 days.
Thank you Ma'am for you pro active and friendly approach to make everything comfortable for me.

My mother was suffering from pain abdomen & bleeding problem then I visit to Dr. Poonam khera she diagnosed that my mother has right broad ligament fibroid with left Ovarian cyst with thickened ET. After all discussions with doctor we decide for surgery. Dr. Poonam khera did total laparoscopic hysterectomy with bilateral salpingo-oopherectomy. My mother was discharged after 36 hours of surgery. My experience with Dr. Poonam khera was very excellent.

I was suffering from bleeding problem & pain abdomen, but no relief with medicine. So, I consulted Dr. POONAM KHERA she did my Total Laparoscopic Hysterectomy in BLK-MAX I didn’t face any problem under her. I was discharged after 36-48 hours.
My experience with Dr. POONAM KHERA was Very good very polite and caring.

Dr Poonam has been our family's gynaecologist and obstetrician .one of the most compassionate,caring, kind-hearted doctor with lots of patience to understand and explain the underlying problem.myself being a doctor I had an opportunity to watch her doing surgeries with great precision and fineness.if I have to undergo any gynae surgery  I trust her only for going under the knife. Highly recommended

I consulted her for my first pregnancy, she listens very patiently to all the doubts and questions and attended very nicely. And i wished to have a normal delivery so she was very much supportive in that too. Shes a very good gynae have recommended her to many people

I had very large fiberoids measuring upto 10cm*6.5cm
My surgery was very complicated and it was handled very carefully by doctor Poonam Khera 
Wonderful experience with . Dr Poonam khera was a wonderful surgeon, and the staff was always helpful and kind. They ensured I had a smooth prep, surgery, and follow-up. I am so glad I chose and would highly recommend to anyone.
My experience with Dr Poonam Khera was very good

*** ****** ***** ** * **** **** ******** I went her at BLK hospital pusa road as i have very large fabroids n m continously bleeding over a month. She operated in such a manner that i felt so good n comfortable as i had nothing. She motivated me also during operation. She is soo friendly n advised me medicines over WhatsApp too. She consulted me when i need her advise despite her busy schedule .  Wish her all the best n thank her.

Dr Poonam is very experienced and efficient doctor.i visited for fibroid removal through laparoscopy and the surgery was successful despite the huge size of the fibroid.also post surgery health results are good.*** ** *** **** *** ************ **********
Good  *** **** ************** and I am satisfied with doctor treatment I am so happy to interact with doctor

I was suffering from post menopausal bleeding,but I was not relieved from previous treatment. Then I consulted Dr. Poonam khera she did my total laparoscopic hysterectomy with BSO in BLK Max I didn't face any problem under her . I was discharged after 36-48 hr.
My experience with Dr. Poonam khera was very good, she is very friendly and experienced
I am fully satisfied with my surgery.

Dr.poonam khera is very politely . She is understand all problems which is what saying patient. She is full checkup of patient very satisfaction.realy Doctor is  very exilent.
        Thanks
She is very friendly. She tries to go down the root cause of the problem. She does not blindly follow the earlier reports but makes her owm conclusion

Dr Poonam Khera treated my wife like a family member rather than patient. She mentor my wife like a mother rather than Doctor.

Her advice build up confidence in her patient.

She believe in natural delivery of baby and avoid unnecessary cesarean delivery.

I consider myself very lucky to be blessed with such doctor.

We know her since 2013 and approach for endometriosis cyst treatment. Conclude my experience in few words "She is very helpful and polite with strong experience in gyane and obstetrics". Recently 29th November 2021, my wife underwent Cystectomy via laparoscopy surgery at BLK and it was successfully conducted by her. I heartily thanks for all supportive suggestions.

She is a genuine highly experienced doctor who gives the patient time and explains the problem procedure to them.... Highly polite lady. My sister got operated in blk just few days back. Nurses were also extremely  polite and helpful who were there during our stay.

She is awasome, l loved everything ,loved the way she explained everything ,her polite nature   . I m very much satisfied. Will definitely recommend my knowns. She prescribed medication for next 15Days. Let see what happened

*** ** *** **** ************** ** ***** * Very helpful and approachable. Very experienced and confident, so much so that she relieves you of any anxiety that you have at any given time. Really professional.

Nice treatment in this hospital by Dr.  poonam khera.
I will always recommand to mam And facilities given by hospital also excellent
The doctor didn't seem interested at all; she was more occupied with her phone. Besides, prescribed me a medicine **** ** ********* ***** ** ***** *** **** **** ***** ****** * *** *** *** ***** *****
